description: Redevelopment of the site to provide for 47 No. flats, cycle parking and refuse store.
decision_conditions: REASON:  The development due to its inappropriate height and bulk would result in an undue loss of daylight to the neighbouring habitable room windows of Tilney Gardens to the detriment of existing residential amenities.  The proposal is contrary to policy D3 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
